global_flags.description: -o and --option can be used multiple times to set different options.
remove --purge is equivalent to the purge command. Configuration Item: APT::Get::Purge.

subcommands.name: changelog
subcommands.description: Download and display the changelog for the given package

subcommands.name: check
subcommands.description: Verify that there are no broken dependencies

subcommands.name: download
subcommands.description: Download the binary package into the current directory

subcommands.name: install
subcommands.description: Install new packages (pkg is libc6 not libc6.deb)

subcommands.name: reinstall
subcommands.description: Reinstall packages (pkg is libc6 not libc6.deb)
